sense.gloss: fifth month of the lunar calendar
fine weather during the rainy season
sea-run variety of red-spotted masu trout (subspecies of cherry salmon, Oncorhynchus masou ishikawae), red-spotted masu salmon

sdata.j: この↑恋↑↓こい↓の↑莟↑↓つぼみ↓は↑皐月↑↓さつき↓の↑風↑↓かぜ↓に↑育↑↓そだ↓てられて、↑又↑↓また↓↑逢↑↓あ↓うまでには↑美↑↓うつく↓しゅう↑咲↑↓さ↓くであろう。
sdata.e: This bud of love, by summer’s ripening breath, may prove a beauteous flower when next we meet.
